ModMetaData.name: RimFantasy - Crystallic Lighting
ModMetaData.author: Sierra
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Mod Version: v0.1-b.1[/h1]
This mod adds 2 new magical gemstone pedestals that radiates light into their surroundings.
These pedestals are safe to place under the rain and are quite beautiful to look at. Be careful though, the energies within the crystals are barely contained and excessive damage will produce a small explosion.
[b]Features:[/b] [list] [*]2 Pedestals (Plant growing/General lighting) [*]1 Research [/list]
[b]Recommended Mods:[/b] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1234567890]RimFantasy - Core[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1234567890]RimFantasy - Temperature Regulation[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2244594116]RimTraits - Vanilla Trait Colors[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1916352291]RimTraits - Medieval Talent[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2206957172]RimTraits - General Traits[/url] [/list]
[b]Mod Compatibility:[/b] [list] [*]No Specific Issues Known. [*]Probably won't play nice with other gem mod without a patch. [/list]
[b]Balance:[/b] Gems are intentionally sparse and not easy to obtain through natural means, but can be obtained through trades and from salvaging certain objects.
Balance feedbacks are welcomed, please provide context when doing so.
[url=https://discord.gg/rimworld]Click here to join us on the Community Discord![/url]
[h1]Credits:[/h1] [list] [*]SirLalaPyon for his amazing, high quality vanilla styled art. [/list]

[b]v0.3-b.3[/b] [list] [*][Fix] Rough Ruby will now be cut into Ruby instead of Diamond. [/list]
[b]v0.3-b.4[/b] [list] [*][Fix] Gem trading for all traders are now enabled. [*][Change] Rough Gemstone value increased from 5 -> 10. [*][Change] Cut Gemstone value increased from 8 -> 25. [*][Buff] Cut Gemstone is now worth double the royal favor to Royal Tribute Collectors. [*][Nerf] Rough Gemstone mining yield decreased from 36 -> 12. [/list]
